topic.title: The Pop-up Form Control
topic.shortdesc: The oxy_popup built-in form control is used to offer a contextual menu that provides quick access to various actions. A pop-up form control can display single or multiple selections.

body.p:
The oxy_popup form control supports the following properties:
If the value of the rows property is not specified, the default value of 12 is used.
This property is used for rendering in the Author mode.
The value of the resultSeparator property cannot exceed one character.
labels - Specifies the label associated with each entry used for presentation. If this property is not specified, the values property is used instead.
This property is used for the visual representation of the form control.
To make the Pop-up form control inherit its font from its parent element, set the fontInherit property to true.In the subsequent example, the value of the fontInherit property is true, which means the pop-up form control inherits the font size of 30px from the font-size property.

example.title: Pop-up Form Control
